channel.title: Knowledgebase | by Christie Templeton
channel.description: Recent content on Knowledgebase | by Christie Templeton

item.title: Installation
item.description:
role="alert">HUGO v0.32 minimum required to use this theme

The following steps are here to help you initialize your new website. If you don’t know Hugo at all, we strongly suggest you to train by following this great documentation for beginners.

item.title: Configuration
item.description: When building the website, you can set a theme by using --theme option. We suggest you to edit your configuration file and set the theme by default. Example with config.toml format.

item.title: How to Create an Account
item.description: How to Create an Account This is an example article. It is intended to demonstrate some of the key styling elements for KnowledgeBase, the knowledge base static website sample by Christie Templeton. Why choose KnowledgeBase? KnowledgeBase is a Hugo theme customized by Christie Templeton, which is based off of the Porting Grav Learn theme and the Knowall Wordpress theme. This site serves as a help center for your product or service.
